column4: Is there any chance of getting Ubuntu's installation to detect and use the VIA RAID IDE controller for installation? I can see all the hard drives on the system, but the ones linked on a Raid-0 array just show up as individual hard drives and as unallocated.
Hmm, only the alternate cd can do it, through textmode install?
fakeraid, yes, normal raid also works with normal installer
I see. Well that's a bummer.
